original_text: And Jesus answering said unto him, Seest thou these great buildings? there shall not be left one stone upon another, that shall not be thrown down.
korean_text: 예수께서 이르시되 네가 이 큰 건물들을 보느냐 돌 하나도 돌 위에 남지 않고 다 무너뜨려지리라 하시니라

sentences.original_text: And Jesus answering said unto him
there shall not be left one stone upon another
sentences.korean_translation: 돌 위에 돌 하나도 남지 않을 것이며

sentences.original_text: that shall not be thrown down
